itemInfo.itemDesc: All DP -15, All AP +25 for 8 min\n- Cooldown: 5 min

item.name: Oil of Regeneration
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Oil of Regeneration
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Clear Liquid Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Ghost Mushroom
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used as an ingredient in Alchemy and Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Marie Cave. Ghost Mushrooms can be Gathered using Bare Hands or a Hoe.

 â€» Consuming this item without Cooking will grant a special buff, but you may be poisoned!

item.name: Trace of Battle
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Bernianto Farm.

item.name: Cedar Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Cedar Trees with a Fluid Collector.
